abstract: Pentagon truck full of presidential seals, lecterns and sound equipment used in appearances by Pres Obama is stolen from outside suburban Richmond, Va, hotel.
snippet: A Pentagon truck full of presidential seals, lecterns and sound equipment was stolen from outside a hotel in Virginia, where President Obama was preparing to visit to push his jobs bill.
lead_paragraph: A Pentagon truck full of presidential seals, lecterns and sound equipment was stolen from outside a hotel in Virginia, where President Obama was preparing to visit to push his jobs bill.

headline.main: Virginia: If You See a Presidential Seal on eBay ...
headline.print_headline: Virginia: If You See a Presidential Seal on eBay ...
headline.seo: Pentagon Truck Full of Presidential Seals Stolen in Virginia
